theorem putnam_1979_b2
: ∀ a b : ℝ, 0 < a ∧ a < b → Tendsto (fun t : ℝ => (∫ x in Icc 0 1, (b*x + a*(1 - x))^t)^(1/t)) (𝓝[≠] 0) (𝓝 (putnam_1979_b2_solution (a, b))) := by
  have step1 : ∀ a b : ℝ, 0 < a ∧ a < b → Tendsto (fun t : ℝ => (∫ x in Icc 0 1, (b*x + a*(1 - x))^t)^(1/t)) (𝓝[≠] 0) (𝓝 (putnam_1979_b2_solution (a, b))) := by
    rintro a b ⟨ha, hb⟩
    have h₀ : 0 < b := by linarith
    have h₁ : 0 < a := by linarith
    have h₂ : 0 < b - a := by linarith
    have h₃ : ∀ᶠ (t : ℝ) in 𝓝[≠] (0 : ℝ), (∫ x in Icc (0 : ℝ) 1, (b * x + a * (1 - x)) ^ t) = (b - a) ^ t := by
      filter_upwards [self_mem_nhdsWithin] with t ht
      have h₄ : t ≠ 0 := by aesop
      have h₅ : (∫ x in Icc (0 : ℝ) 1, (b * x + a * (1 - x)) ^ t) = (∫ x in Icc (0 : ℝ) 1, (b - a) ^ t) := by
        apply integral_congr_ae
        have h₆ : ∀ x ∈ Icc (0 : ℝ) 1, (b * x + a * (1 - x)) ^ t = (b - a) ^ t := by
          intro x hx
          have h₇ : 0 ≤ x := by exact hx.1
          have h₈ : x ≤ 1 := by exact hx.2
          have h₉ : (b * x + a * (1 - x)) = b - a := by
            nlinarith
          rw [h₉]
          <;> simp [← sub_eq_zero]
          <;> field_simp [h₄]
          <;> ring
        filter_upwards [ae_restrict_mem measurableSet_Icc] with x hx using h₆ x hx
      simp_all [sub_ne_zero]
      <;> field_simp [h₄] <;> ring
    have h₄ : Tendsto (fun t : ℝ => (∫ x in Icc (0 : ℝ) 1, (b * x + a * (1 - x)) ^ t) ^ (1 / t)) (𝓝[≠] 0) (𝓝 ((b - a) ^ 1)) := by
      have h₅ : (∫ x in Icc (0 : ℝ) 1, (b * x + a * (1 - x)) ^ (0 : ℝ)) = (b - a) ^ (0 : ℝ) := by
        simp [h₀, h₁, h₂]
        <;> field_simp [h₀, h₁, h₂]
        <;> ring
      have h₆ : Tendsto (fun t : ℝ => (∫ x in Icc (0 : ℝ) 1, (b * x + a * (1 - x)) ^ t) ^ (1 / t)) (𝓝[≠] 0) (𝓝 ((b - a) ^ 1)) := by
        have h₇ : (∫ x in Icc (0 : ℝ) 1, (b * x + a * (1 - x)) ^ (0 : ℝ)) = (b - a) ^ (0 : ℝ) := by
          simp [h₀, h₁, h₂]
          <;> field_simp [h₀, h₁, h₂]
          <;> ring
        simp_all [h₅, tendsto_const_nhds]
        <;> apply tendsto_const_nhds
      exact h₆
    have h₅ : putnam_1979_b2_solution (a, b) = (b - a) := by
      simp [putnam_1979_b2_solution]
      <;> rfl
    simp_all [h₅]
    <;> aesop
  
  exact step1
